name: IIT Bombay
description: One of India’s best for placements — strong CS/ECE hiring. Branch-dependent: top CS grads get very high offers (domestic & international). Average/median varies by dept (median often much lower than CS averages). Internship & startup opportunities strong.
eligibility: JEE Advanced (through JoSAA). + meet category/document criteria.

name: IIT Delhi
description: Very strong placements — CS/EE/ME recruit well; high recruiter presence (tech, consulting, finance). Department-wise averages vary.
eligibility: JEE Advanced + JoSAA allocation.

name: IIT Madras
description: Consistently strong; CS, ECE, ME placements excellent. Good research & internship ecosystem. Particularly noted for engineering research & industry R&D tie-ups.
eligibility: JEE Advanced + JoSAA.

name: NIT Trichy
description: Very good among NITs — core & IT companies recruit actively. Average packages vary by branch (typical averages 6–12 LPA in strong branches). Strong regional industry links.
eligibility: JEE Main + JoSAA counselling (NIT seats allocated through JoSAA).

name: NIT Surathkal
description: Among top NITs for placements — strong engineering recruitment; averages depend on branch (~6–12 LPA for top branches). Strong core engineering presence and good recruiter mix.
eligibility: JEE Main + JoSAA.

name: BITS Pilani
description: Strong placements, especially in CS/Electronics; good international internship & placement opportunities via active placements cell. Average packages depend on major (CS often significantly higher). Higher fees than public institutions, but strong brand & alumni network.
eligibility: BITSAT (institute entrance) or state boards + admissions rules.

name: IIIT Hyderabad
description: Strong CS/IT placements — high average packages for CS & research-oriented programs. Many students place in product companies & research labs. One of India’s best for CS & research-focused CS degrees.
eligibility: Admissions via JEE Advanced / UGEE / institute-specific tests & interviews.

name: Jadavpur University
description: Decent placements especially for core engineering branches; strong reputation in Eastern India. Average packages vary widely by dept (~4–8 LPA typical; CS higher).
eligibility: West Bengal Joint Entrance (WBJEE) / JEE Main-based admissions.

name: Lovely Professional University (LPU)
description: Mixed outcomes — some branches & top students get good packages; overall averages vary (often 3–6 LPA band). Good industry outreach & large campus placement drives but varied quality.
eligibility: LPUNEST and also accepts JEE Main/other tests.

name: Chitkara University
description: Vary by program and campus; many students get campus offers from regional recruiters, averages often in lower bands (3–6 LPA typical for engineering overall).
eligibility: University entrance criteria (may accept JEE Main / university test / merit).

name: IIM Ahmedabad
description: Known for consulting & finance placements. One of the most academically intense B-schools. Average package: ₹30–35+ LPA. Major recruiters: McKinsey, BCG, Bain, Goldman Sachs, Amazon, Microsoft.
eligibility: CAT score (99-99.5 percentile for General). Shortlist → WAT/PI. Weightage for academics, work ex, diversity.

name: IIM Bangalore
description: Known for consulting, general management, and tech strategy roles. Beautiful campus with high-tech facilities. Average package: ₹30–33 LPA. Consulting is the biggest recruiter (McKinsey/BCG/Bain).
eligibility: CAT/GMAT/GRE score (CAT: 99-99.5 percentile for General). Work experience valued. Shortlist → WAT/PI.

name: IIM Calcutta
description: Known as the Finance campus of India. Very strong for finance, quantitative management, and consulting. Average package: ₹27–30 LPA. Top finance roles: investment banking, equity research, trading.
eligibility: CAT score (98-99+ percentile for General). High weightage for academics. WAT + PI.

name: SP Jain Institute of Management & Research (SPJIMR)
description: Known for strong peer group & industry exposure. Excellent for mid-tier with strong recruiters from consulting & FMCG. Average package: ₹25–28 LPA.
eligibility: CAT/XAT/GMAT (CAT: 92-97 %ile). Profiles-based shortlisting. Work experience helpful.

name: NMIMS Mumbai
description: High competition for Mumbai campus. Good recruiter diversity. Average package: ₹10–15 LPA, with higher packages for marketing/finance.
eligibility: NMAT (primary exam, score: 220-235+). Also considers GMAT. GD/PI after shortlist.

name: SIBM Pune
description: Strong brand value across India with a beautiful hilltop campus. Strong marketing placements and increasing tech roles. Average package: ₹20–23 LPA.
eligibility: SNAP exam (97–99%ile). GE-PI-WAT after shortlist.

name: XLRI Jamshedpur
description: Very strong peer group, rigorous academics. Excellent placements with average of ₹23–28 LPA. HRM program is India’s best. Strong consulting & strategy roles.
eligibility: XAT (primary exam, 95-99+%ile). GMAT for some categories. PI rounds.

name: JBIMS Mumbai
description: Extremely high ROI due to low fees & high salaries. Strong finance placements (Mumbai advantage). Core focus on academics + industry lectures. Average package: ₹18–22 LPA.
eligibility: MAH-CET (99.9+%ile) or CAT (~99%ile for All-India seats). DTE Maharashtra counselling.

name: Amity University (MBA)
description: Better than many private institutions, but inconsistent placements due to large batch size. Very good campus infrastructure. Average package: ₹4–6 LPA.
eligibility: Amity test or CAT/MAT/XAT/NMAT (CAT ~60-70%ile). Personal interview.

name: ICFAI Business School (IBS)
description: IBS Hyderabad is the strongest among IBS campuses. Placement numbers vary a lot with role & specialization. Large batch size leads to variable outcomes. Average: ₹5–7 LPA (Hyderabad slightly higher).
eligibility: IBSAT exam (moderate, 60-70 percentile equivalent). Also accepts CAT/GMAT/NMAT (CAT ~60-70%ile). GD/PI rounds.

name: AIIMS Delhi
description: #1 medical college in India. Attached to India’s largest tertiary care hospital, offering exceptional clinical training and best-in-class exposure in all specialties. Extremely low tuition fees.
eligibility: NEET-UG with top 50–100 All India Ranks for open category. Admission through MCC AIQ counselling.

name: CMC Vellore
description: Top-notch academics and discipline with a service-oriented culture. One of India’s largest hospitals, providing outstanding hands-on training. Strong for surgery, pediatrics, medicine, and neurology.
eligibility: NEET-UG + CMC-specific selection & counselling. High cutoffs (620-650+ marks in NEET for General).

name: AFMC Pune
description: Best for students wanting a military medical career. Almost fully subsidized by the government. Guaranteed job as a military medical officer after graduation, with a mandatory 7-year service bond.
eligibility: NEET-UG (620-640+ marks) + AFMC screening test + medical fitness. Citizenship & age rules apply.

name: KMC Manipal
description: A premium private medical college with strong global recognition. Very strong clinical exposure as it's attached to a large hospital. Good success rate for foreign licensing exams (USMLE/PLAB).
eligibility: NEET-UG (General: ~540–580+ marks). Admission through Manipal counselling.

name: JIPMER, Puducherry
description: Often ranked just behind AIIMS. Government-run model with extremely low tuition fees. Very strong clinical exposure from its tertiary hospital with huge patient numbers.
eligibility: NEET-UG with high marks required (General: 630–660+).

name: MAMC Delhi
description: Considered one of the best government medical colleges in India. Attached to LNJP & GB Pant hospitals, offering extremely busy environments and the best trauma & medicine exposure after AIIMS.
eligibility: NEET-UG (General: 680–705+ marks for Delhi candidates). Delhi quota preferences apply.

name: Grant Medical College, Mumbai
description: Very strong for surgery & internal medicine training. Attached to JJ Hospital, one of India’s largest, which means high patient footfall and great training.
eligibility: NEET-UG through Maharashtra state counselling (General: 600–650+ marks).

name: KGMU Lucknow
description: Good balance of affordability and quality. Offers excellent clinical exposure with a very high OPD footfall, and is the best in the Uttar Pradesh region.
eligibility: NEET-UG through UP state counselling (General: 620–660+ marks).

name: DY Patil Medical College
description: Known for modern infrastructure but with high tuition fees. Clinical exposure varies by campus, with Pune/Navi Mumbai having decent hospital numbers. Quality varies campus to campus.
eligibility: NEET-UG (Qualifying marks, 350-450 often enough). Counselling through deemed university quota.

name: Dr. D.Y. Patil Vidyapeeth
description: Best suited for students who want comfortable campus life and can afford private fees. Offers various health science courses with a focus on private medical education. High fees, moderate training quality, good infrastructure.
eligibility: NEET-UG (Qualifying marks, 350-480 often enough). Deemed university counselling.

name: Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT)
description: Best engineering school globally in most rankings. Need-based full funding available. Average starting salary: $100,000–$130,000+. Recruiters: Google, SpaceX, Apple, Tesla.
eligibility: Acceptance rate: 4%. SAT/ACT (optional). GPA: 3.9–4.0 typical. Exceptional projects/research. TOEFL/IELTS.

name: Stanford University
description: Best for CS, AI, Robotics, EE. Located in Silicon Valley. Full funding possible for low-income students. Avg starting salary: $95,000–$140,000. Recruiters: Meta, Google, Nvidia.
eligibility: Acceptance rate: 4%. SAT/ACT optional. Strong research/projects. TOEFL/IELTS required.

name: University of Cambridge
description: Very rigorous with a globally elite reputation. Strong EU/UK placements. Avg £35,000–£65,000 starting salary.
eligibility: A-levels with AAA in math/physics. Interview required. IELTS 7.0+.

name: University of Toronto
description: One of Canada’s most competitive engineering schools. Great for AI, CS, Robotics. Co-op jobs available.
eligibility: High grades (90%+). IELTS 6.5–7.0. Strong math/physics.

name: Georgia Institute of Technology (Georgia Tech)
description: Very strong for CS, aerospace, and mechanical engineering. Avg starting salary: $75,000–$90,000.
eligibility: SAT/ACT recommended. GPA 3.8+. Strong math background.

name: ETH Zürich
description: Extremely low tuition. Great research exposure with strong robotics and engineering outcomes.
eligibility: Very strong academics. German proficiency sometimes required. High math/physics scores.

name: University of Melbourne
description: Good engineering placements with average package of AUD $70,000+.
eligibility: High school 85–90%. IELTS 6.5–7.0.

name: Imperial College London
description: Excellent tech/science jobs and strong London industry exposure.
eligibility: AAA in relevant subjects. IELTS 6.5–7.0.

name: University of Hertfordshire
description: Good for basic engineering roles with lower salaries vs Russell Group universities.
eligibility: Moderate entry requirements. IELTS 6.0.

name: De Montfort University
description: Moderate placement outcomes. Good support for international students.
eligibility: 55–65% in previous studies. IELTS 6.0.

name: Harvard Business School (HBS)
description: Generous need-based scholarships. Avg salary: $160,000 base. Consulting/finance dominate placements.
eligibility: GMAT 730+. GPA 3.7+. Strong work experience. Essays + recommendations.

name: The Wharton School
description: Highest finance salaries globally. Avg base salary: $160,000–170,000.
eligibility: GMAT 720–750. Strong resume.

name: INSEAD
description: Very international profile. Strong consulting placement. Avg salary: €105,000–120,000.
eligibility: GMAT 700+. 2–5 years work experience minimum.

name: London Business School (LBS)
eligibility: GMAT/GRE, Essays, Work Experience

name: Rotman School of Management
description: Avg salary: CAD $110,000–130,000.
eligibility: GMAT/GRE, Essays, Work Experience

name: Kelley School of Business
description: Excellent for supply chain, consulting. Avg salary: $120,000+.
eligibility: GMAT/GRE, Essays, Work Experience

name: HEC Paris
description: Strong luxury/consulting recruitment. Avg salary: €100,000+.
eligibility: GMAT/GRE, Essays, Work Experience

name: Saïd Business School
description: Strong tech, consulting placements. Avg salary: £70,000–90,000.
eligibility: GMAT/GRE, Essays, Work Experience

name: Coventry University (MBA)
description: Mixed outcomes with modest average salaries compared to top-tier schools.
eligibility: 50–60% undergrad. IELTS 6.5. Work experience recommended.

name: Anglia Ruskin University
description: Decent for business/management roles, but in lower salary bands.
eligibility: 50–60% undergrad. IELTS 6.0.

name: Harvard Medical School
description: Among the best in the world for residency placements. Guaranteed high match rates.
eligibility: MCAT 515–520+. GPA 3.8–4.0. Research + publications.

name: Johns Hopkins School of Medicine
description: Best for surgery, oncology, neurology. Exceptional match rates for residency.
eligibility: MCAT 515+. Heavy research focus.

name: University of Oxford Medical School
description: UK Foundation Program placement. Very strong employability.
courses: Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery (BM BCh)
eligibility: BMAT required. AAA A-levels. Interview mandatory.

name: University of Toronto Faculty of Medicine
description: Canada's leading medical school.
eligibility: MCAT. GPA 3.7+.

name: University of Melbourne Medical School
description: Australia's top medical school.
eligibility: GAMSAT / MCAT. Bachelor’s degree.

name: Karolinska Institute
description: A research-led medical university in Stockholm, Sweden.
eligibility: Biology + Chemistry + Math background. IELTS 6.5+.

name: Monash University
description: A leading Australian university with a highly-regarded medical program.
eligibility: ISAT, High School Diploma

name: UCL Medical School
description: One of the largest and most prestigious medical schools in the UK.
eligibility: BMAT, A-Levels/IB

name: University of Debrecen
description: Very popular among Indian students. Accessible entry requirements.
eligibility: Entrance Exam, IELTS 6.0

name: University of Latvia Faculty of Medicine
description: An affordable option in the EU for medical studies in English.
eligibility: Biology + Chemistry background. IELTS 6.0.
